OrgName.entry: BROOMGROVE TRUST NURSING AND CONVALESCENT HOME

Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides 35 beds for those who are elderly or have a physical disability. Provides medical services, physiotherapy, complementary therapies and has an activities co-ordinator. Provides long term, short term, respite care and convalescence. Also specialise in palliative care. Has a number of flats for active retired people who must have been residents of Sheffield. Activity programme on site for residents. Also holds regular residents' meetings throughout the year. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
